## priority tasks

```{r}
tasks <- read_rds("data/tasks.rds")

tasks %>% 
  filter(p == "star") %>% 
  arrange(c, p) %>% 
  select(-c, -p) %>% 
  kable() %>% 
  kable_styling()
  

```
